body:
Some tweaks to the post-install environments for intel-oneapi-MKL and intel-oneapi-TBB (e.g. setting MKLROOT and TBBROOT) so that examples published at https://github.com/oneapi-src/oneAPI-samples/tree/master/Libraries/oneMKL will build with generated modules. 

@rscohn2 @scheibelp FYI
title: adding environment to OneMKL packages so that examples will build
